snippet: A deal would settle a monthslong legal dispute and change the rules governing the Hershey Trust Company, which controls more than 80 percent of the chocolate maker’s special voting shares....

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. de la MERCED

lead_paragraph: A deal would settle a monthslong legal dispute and change the rules governing the Hershey Trust Company, which controls more than 80 percent of the chocolate maker’s special voting shares.

headline.main: Hershey Trust Reaches Tentative Deal With Pennsylvania on Governance
